sn46.57:1.2: “Mendicants, when the perception of a skeleton is developed and cultivated it’s very fruitful and beneficial.
sn46.57:1.4: It’s when a mendicant develops the perception of a skeleton together with the awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion,
sn46.57:1.5: and equanimity, which rely on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripen as letting go.
sn46.57:1.6: That’s how the perception of a skeleton, when developed and cultivated, is very fruitful and beneficial.”
sn46.57:2.1: “When the perception of a skeleton is developed and cultivated you can expect one of two results: enlightenment in the present life, or if there’s something left over, non-return.
sn46.57:3.1: “Mendicants, when the perception of a skeleton is developed and cultivated it leads to great benefit.
sn46.57:4.1: “Mendicants, when the perception of a skeleton is developed and cultivated it leads to great sanctuary from the yoke.
sn46.57:5.1: “Mendicants, when the perception of a skeleton is developed and cultivated it leads to great inspiration.
sn46.57:6.1: “Mendicants, when the perception of a skeleton is developed and cultivated it leads to dwelling in great ease.
